aboutImgAlt: Mateusz Wroblewski is programming in a coffee shop on his laptop.
whoFrom: I am a Frontend Developer located in Poland.
story: My adventure with programming began with creating websites during computer science classes in middle school. Now, after several years I came back to creating websites and web applications using the latest technologies.
goal: My main professional goal is to find a job that will give me the opportunity to constantly deepen and improve my previously acquired programming skills, engage in interesting and creative projects and improve my professional qualifications.
futureDevelopment: In the future, I primarily want to focus on developing skills in technologies such as JavaScript and React.
hobby: In my free time I like reading books, running, taking pictures and playing electric guitar.
